resources.string: You can find popular destinations around you for short weekend ride or long distance occasional trips.
You can add places to your planning list in a click and configure at any comfortable time for reminders, including friends going along with

Get exciting destinations plan for special days like marriage days, birthdays, kids summer vacation, year end, etc. And you know, you will forget by your work pressure but we will remember to remind you on right time
"That is not the end. Once you start a journey, you will be routined with whole schedule plan so you won't miss to book the hotel, food during drive time, and to track your friends locations."
